message.entry: First argument must be a 2-dimensional matrix.
Column sorting vector must contain integers with absolute value between 1 and the number of columns in the first argument.
Some cells in X contain non-scalar values and cannot be sorted.
All contents of the input cell array must be of the same data type.
DIR option must be a Character Vector, Cell Character Vector or String array.
DIR option must be of the same size as COL.
DIR option must be a scalar if used as second argument.
''ComparisonMethod'' parameter not supported when first argument is a {0} array.
''MissingPlacement'' parameter not supported when first argument is a {0} array.
Incorrect number of arguments. Parameter names and values must occur in pairs.
Sorting direction must specify one direction or a direction for each column in the first argument.
Sorting direction must specify one direction or a direction for each element of the column sorting vector.
Second argument must specify a column sorting vector or sorting direction.
Sorting direction must be a character vector or cell array of character vectors.
